name: But WHO Do I Care For?
name_original: But WHO Do I Care For?
description:
Take care of your friends, but don't forget about yourself! This hyper-casual game is best played with a mouse (not a mouse pad), and is also mobile friendly.

Credits

Music:

Ceci Beats - Secret Robot Parade: https://soundcloud.com/cecibeats/secretrobotparade

Little Robot Sound Factory: www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com
